example.name: intransitive
example.text: The state Supply Regulator Institute is [*-3] to burn rice , corn and beans that [*T*-1] spoiled because of neglect and corruption in the previous Christian Democrat government , a statement from the information service SISAL said [0] [*T*-2] .
example.arg: because of neglect and corruption in the previous Christian Democrat government

example.name: transitive
example.text: It is widely known [*-1] that `` too many cooks spoil the broth , '' but that wisdom does not necessarily reflect the view of the cooks , especially if they are senators .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'spoil' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
